name: Lucid (itch) (disstillwill)
description:
Lucid is the result of a six-week summer programming experience at Princeton University made by myself and my project partner with Unity3D. While this WebGL build of the game is far from perfect,  it is a decent way to demonstrate Unity's multiplatform support.

Controls: 

WASD to move

Spacebar to jump

E to interact

Escape to pause

Github Repository:

https://github.com/disstillwill/Lucid
